Deadeus is a horror adventure game that centers around a boy who had a nightmare about an otherworldly god named Daedeus. In that dream, the god told the boy that he gave humanity the gift of life, but it is a debt that is long overdue. Deadeus said that he will kill every living thing on Earth in three days and only then the debt will be repaid. The main character must find a way to stop the god and save his village. The game has 11 endings.

The game plays as a contextual adventure game where the player talks to NPCs, reads notes, and finds items to solve puzzles.
title: Deadeus

description: The player receives a virtual pet, one of four selectable species from a fortune teller. Taking the framework of a Tamagotchi game, the job of the player is to train the pet by playing a series of mini-games on a day by day basis in preparation for five different competitions. The goal is to win trophies from the competitions. It is important to care for the virtual pet or risk losing it before a competition begins.
title: Animal Breeder

description: Animal Breeder 2 is the second title of the Animal Breeder quadrilogy. It contains same basic gameplay mechanics of the first title, but types of virtual pets have been increased to a total of eight, simply by crossbreeding the four selectable ones. The player now has eight competitions to train the pet for in order to win trophies and become the top Animal Breeder, while taking utmost care of the pet.
title: Animal Breeder 2

description: Dino Breeder is related to the Animal Breeder games. It has the player (with the aid of a professor) travel around the world to hatch, raise, and train dinosaurs, with the goal of obtaining the title of Top Dinosaur to the toughest of them all While ensuring that pet dinosaurs in the player’s care get adequately fed and kept content as they grow, the player may need to battle wild dinosaurs.
title: Dino Breeder

description: As a followup to the NES game Booby Kids, the player goes through six different eras fighting or dodging enemies, collecting treasure, and navigating maze-like stages. Each stage requires collecting all treasure to obtain the exit door key. In the last stage of each era, the player fights a boss enemy and rescues one of the trapped booby girls.

sample_screenshots.caption: Turning the cave into a graveyard

title: Booby Boys

description:
Hermano is a 2D platformer. During the Day of the Dead Mano always visits the grave of his brother, Nano. This year a demon captures Mano, and Nano rises from the dead to rescue his brother!

As the undead Nano you need to find the key on each level to open the door to the next one. Nano can attack by throwing his head at enemies, and can also carry a limited supply of bombs, with some enemies only being vulnerable to bombs.

The original game jam version features six levels spread over three zones.

Developed for, and winner of, the GB Compo 23 game jam.

sample_screenshots.caption: You need the key to unlock this door

title: Hermano

description:
Hermano is a platformer with a light-hearted horror theme. On the Day of the Dead, when the barrier between the worlds of the living and the dead is at its thinnest, Mano is abducted by a demon right on the grave of his brother Nano. Nano rises from the dead and pursues the demon into Hell to be reunited with his brother.

As the undead Nano you need to find the key on each level to open the door to the next one. Nano can attack by throwing his head at enemies, and can also carry a limited supply of bombs, with some obstacles only being vulnerable to bombs.

This version is expanded from the original game jam version, featuring 15 levels over five zones, three bosses and plenty of other improvements.

sample_screenshots.caption: The exit door requires a key

title: Hermano

description: GB Genjin Land is a spinoff of the long-running Genjin/Bonk series. This entry isn't a full traditional platformer, but rather a minigame collection, featuring a variety of action-based minigames. In addition to some standalone platformer stages, others challenge the player to very different gameplay such as a Breakout-style game in which PC Genjin acts as the paddle and players must jump and bonk the ball with their head to hit it back.
title: GB Genjin Land: Viva! Chikkun Ōkoku
